query: Q1. Suppose you see a color fringe around the edges of your subject. Which control is best for removing the fringe?
options:
Color Noise Reduction
 Remove Chromatic Aberration
 Split Toning
 Enable Profile Corrections

query: Q2. If you want to apply the same editing from one image to another, what should you use?
options:
metadata
 Image settings
 Edit settings
 Develop settings

Note: I just use synchronization. After digging into settings I was able only to discover Settings -> Copy settings.

query: Q3. Which module helps you create a printed photo album?
Q5. Adjusting the exposure of a raw file by -1 is the equivalent of doing what in the camera?
options:
opening the aperture one f-stop
 closing the aperture one f-stop
 adjusting the ISO by +400
 adjusting the ISO by -400

query: Q7. Suppose you want to migrate a selection of images to another machine. How can you create a new catalog that contains a copy of all the images?
options:
Use the Export as Catalog command.
 When you back up the catalog, the images are backed up as well.
 Use the Export command.
 Use the Import from Another Catalog command.

query: Q8. Which Spot Healing Brush mode replaces an imperfection with an exact copy of pixels from another area?
options:
Patch mode
 Screen mode
 Healing mode
 Clone mode

query: Q9. When reviewing images, what task can be accomplished using the number keys?
options:
finding images
 printing images
 selecting images
 applying ratings

query: Q10. What's the easiest way to reuse your most recent custom export settings?
options:
Click File > Export with Previous.
 Click File > Export with Preset.
 Click File > Export as Catalog.
 Click File > Export Again.

query: Q12. When exporting an image, which sharpening method is best for use on displays?
options:
Glossy Paper
 Screen
 Internet
 Matte Paper

query: Q13. Which Develop module panel lets you adjust an image based on a color range?
Q14. Which file type will work with the Enhance Details command?
Q15. Suppose that while using the Post Crop Vignetting tool, the Highlights slider is grayed out. What is the most likely cause?
options:
You are using the Paint Overlay style.
 You are editing a raw file.
 You are using the Color Priority style.
 You are using the Highlight Priority style.

query: Q17. Which criteria CANNOT be used with a smart collection?
options:
Export Date
 Capture Date
 Rating
 Camera Serial Number
